= Requirements =
Mumblereader is a [http://jquery.com/ jQuery] library that allows anyone to add a dynamic loading view from there mumble server on there page. All they need is website to add the viewer (you should be able to modify the source) on and somehow a place where they can get the [http://mumble.sourceforge.net/Channel_Viewer_Protocol CVP]. If u have [http://mumble.sourceforge.net/Ice ICE-php] on your server u can generate the [http://mumble.sourceforge.net/Channel_Viewer_Protocol CVP] yourself. Some control panel/hosting have this already for u.
